info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 01 at 10:30PM CDT until June 01 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN THROCKMORTON COUNTY... At 1029 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles south of Millers Creek Reservoir, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Throckmorton and The Intersection Of Us-380 And Highway 222. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
